welcome_message_body: Welcome to Hazelwood, the charming city known for its beautiful parks, friendly community, and delicious local cuisine. We hope you enjoy your stay and take some time to discover all the wonderful things this city has to offer. Happy exploring!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights at Spirit Of St Louis Airport.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for private and charter flights only.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal houses the majority of the airport's facilities, including check-in counters, baggage claim, and departure gates.

terminals.name: East Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic flights and features a variety of dining and retail options.

terminals.name: West Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is mainly used for international flights and offers a variety of amenities, including duty-free shopping and currency exchange.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport. Connect to the network and follow the instructions to access the internet.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St. Louis Downtown Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at St. Louis Downtown Airport, handling freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Alton Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Alton Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Belleville Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Belleville Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
